ProximCloud: Exclusive Discount on London Shared Hosting! (from $1.13/mo!)

london, proximcloud, shared January 4, 2021 @ 12:00 am, by raindog308

Ben from ProximCloud stopped by to kick off 2021 with some nice shared hosting offers from England!

  • Use promo code LEB2021NY for 25% off package!

ProximCloud is coming up on three years in business and is doing very well.  We’ve had them on for Christmas, for Thanksgiving, and back in September.  Their first post here was in April 2020 so they’ve been with us for a while, with good reviews.

They host out of London, so if you’re looking for UK shared hosting, check them out.  Even if you’re not in the UK, shared hosting works from a lot longer range because visitors aren’t expecting same snappy response. If you think of the entire web experience (click on a link, request transmits to host, host processes, host sends response, browser parses, etc.) a few hundreds milliseconds added to a 2-4 second experience is insignificant.

ProximCloud features cPanel on pure SSD, 24×7 support, and the usual trimmings – including 20Gbpx of DDoS protection.  They’ve accumulated many positive reviews on TrustPilot.  Here’s a little more about them in their own words:

“ProximCloud is a small website hosting business, which has been in operation for over two years (since 28th Feb 2018), which has striven based on the reliability and low-cost factors of our services. ProximCloud always puts the customer first, and has ensured to provide our customers with many support-methods to ensure they can reach us when they need it, and when it suits them.”

Their WHOIS is public.  Please review their TOS before signing up.  They accept PayPal.  If you decide to give them a go, please before to comment below and let us know how it goes!

Now read more to see the offers!
